titleInfo.title: 'File 6/41 Provident Fund of the three British Officers under the Bahrain Government'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 63; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 3-57; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence relating to the provident funds of the three British employees of the Bahrain Government: Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Claud Cranbrook Lewis de Grenier, and Captain L S Parke. The correspondence is between Belgrave, de Grenier, the Political Agent, Bahrain, the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, the Government of India (Foreign and Political Department), Lloyds Bank and Eastern Bank.
